title: SOLD- t202 ty cobb steals third center panel
author: basesareempty

posts.post_title: SOLD- t202 ty cobb steals third center panel
posts.post_content:
Card is in vg condition with a roughness to the right edge where it was folded. Similar center panels have sold for $150-200 recently. SOLD. First to say "I'll take it" gets it.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=109&pictureid=10181[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=109&pictureid=10182[/IMG]
